mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHALLENGE (user_seq, is_public, duration) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{isPublic}, #{duration})
mapper.select: SELECT challenge_seq, user_seq, is_public, duration, created_at, updated_at FROM CHALLENGE c JOIN CHALLENGE_JOIN j ON c.challenge_seq = j.challenge_seq WHERE j.user_seq = #{userSeq} and c.is_valid = 1
SELECT challenge_seq, user_seq, is_public, duration, created_at, updated_at FROM CHALLENGE WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} and is_valid = 1
SELECT challenge_seq, user_seq, is_public, duration, created_at, updated_at FROM CHALLENGE WHERE is_valid = 1
SELECT challenge_seq, user_seq, is_public, duration, created_at, updated_at FROM CHALLENGE WHERE challenge_seq = #{challenge_seq} and is_valid = 1

select video_seq, video_id, video_title, video_channel_name, video_duration, video_view_cnt, video_cal, created_at, updated_at , (select count(*) from wish w where w.video_seq = v.video_seq and w.is_valid = 1) as video_wish_cnt , (select count(*) from comment c where c.video_seq = v.video_seq and c.is_valid = 1) as video_comment_cnt from video v right outer join challenge_video cv on v.video_seq = cv.video_seq where v.is_valid = 1 and cv.video_seq = #{videoSeq}

SELECT user_seq, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_birth, user_nickname, user_gender, created_at, updated_at FROM USER u WHERE u.user_seq = (SELECT user_seq FROM CHALLENGE_JOIN c WHERE c.challenge_seq = #{challengeSeq})
